comment.author: 59375758@N06
comment._content: These sequence of photos seem to refer to the German East Africa campaign during the First World War.    The main operations took place in then German East Africa (later on Tanganyika and now Tanzania).   Therefore these photos should not be included in the Kenya collection but rather the Tanzania collection.

comment.author: 26227071@N03
comment._content: The location is referred to as 'Rhodesian' so it would then be in the Zimbabwe or Zambia collections, though shouldn't they be referred to by their colonial names?
